title: Seraph

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Accompany the sun at night. You may write a <200 character message. At the beginning of the next day, every Town member except for any number of players of your choice will receive that message.
- Blaze upon the Town during the day. The next night, every Town member may choose to deal a Powerful attack to their first night target in addition to their ability’s effect.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- You start the game with two wings. Whenever you use an ability, you lose a wing. If you would lose a wing when you don’t have any wings, you die instead.
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- Players killed by attacks through your second ability’s effect appear to have been killed by a 2441: Seraph’s follower.

desc:
Post 2441
*The sun brings light-- healing, nourishing light to all.*
